  • public class SectorDeck
extends Deck<SectorCard>
    Defines the deck of Sector Cards
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SectorDeck()
      Constructor for a sector deck. 5 Silence cards 10 Noise In Your Sector Cards (4 let you get an item, 6 don't) 10 Noise In Any Sector Cards (4 let you get an item, 6 don't)

        public SectorCard pickCard()
